Text: Will upload May 15 & 16 shows later. I haven't gotten to them yet.

Thanks for these, 480!

You don't have to upload shows that are already a few days old by the time you get to them.  I keep up with my progressive politics with Nicole Sandler's live podcast Monday through Thursday mornings.

But it's always refreshing to get the Ed Schulzt and Thom Hartmann perspectives as well!

Regarding the Right to Vote Act, the Republicans in the House won't go for it anyway as long as Boehner is still running things there.  And that's if it doesn't get fillibustered in the Senate first....
